description: Questions requiring understanding and analysis of charts, graphs, and visual data

qa_pairs.question: 根据销售趋势图，哪个月份的销售额出现了最大跌幅？跌幅是多少？
qa_pairs.answer: 8月份出现最大跌幅，环比下降23.5%
reasoning_steps: 识别图表中的月度销售数据点
计算每个月的环比变化
确定对应的月份和跌幅百分比

qa_pairs.question: Based on the pie chart showing market share, what is the combined market share of the top 3 companies?
qa_pairs.answer: The top 3 companies hold 67.8% of the market share combined
reasoning_steps: Identify the top 3 segments in the pie chart
Extract percentage values for each segment
Sum the percentages of the top 3 companies

qa_pairs.question: 散点图显示了产品价格与客户满意度的关系，价格在什么区间时客户满意度最高？
qa_pairs.answer: 价格在200-300元区间时，客户满意度最高，集中在4.5-4.8分

text_snippets: 价格与满意度相关性分析

reasoning_steps: 观察散点图中的数据分布
识别高满意度（4.5分以上）的数据点
确定这些数据点对应的价格区间

qa_pairs.question: From the stacked bar chart showing quarterly revenue by product category, which category showed consistent growth across all four quarters?
qa_pairs.answer: Software Services showed consistent quarter-over-quarter growth throughout the year
reasoning_steps: Examine each product category's segment in the stacked bars
Compare the height of each category across Q1-Q4
Identify which category increases in every quarter
Verify no quarter shows a decrease for that category
